6.3. Threshold Signatures¶

class aleph.crypto.threshold_signatures.SecretKey(sk)¶

An object used for generating shares of a signature of a message.

Parameters

sk (int) – secret used for signing

generate_share(msg_hash)¶

Generates a share of a signature of a hash of a message.

Parameters

msg_hash (int) – hash of a message which signature share is generated

class aleph.crypto.threshold_signatures.VerificationKey(threshold, vk, vks)¶

An object used for verifying shares and signatures and for combining shares into signatures.

Parameters

  • threshold (int) – number of signature shares needed to generate a signature

  • vk (int) – global verification key

  • vks (list) – verification keys corresponding to secret keys of all parties

combine_shares(shares)¶

Combines shares into a signature of a message.

Parameters

shares (dict) – shares of a signature to be produced

hash_fct(msg)¶

Hash function used for hashing messages into group G1.

Parameters

msg (string) – message to be hashed

Returns

element of G1 group

hash_msg(msg)¶

Hashes a message before signing.

Parameters

msg (bytes) – message to be hashed

lagrange(S, i)¶

Lagrange approximation.

Parameters

  • S (list) – list of values for numerator

  • i (int) – special value for denumerator

verify_share(share, i, msg_hash)¶

Verifies if a share generated by i-th party is valid.

Parameters

  • share (int) – share of a signature of a hash of a message

  • i (int) – index number of a party

  • msg_hash (int) – hash of a message that is signed

verify_signature(signature, msg_hash)¶

Verifies if signature is valid.

Parameters

  • signature (int) – signature of msg_hash to be chacked

  • msg_hash (int) – hash of a message corresponding to signature.

aleph.crypto.threshold_signatures.generate_keys(n_parties, threshold)¶

Generates one verification key and n_parties secret keys.

Parameters

  • n_parties (int) – number of parties that need secret keys

  • threshold (int) – number of signature shares required for generating a signature
